snippet: The alliance seeks to build on the results of an experimental treatment that trains a person’s immune system to kill cancer cells.
abstract: Drugmaker Novartis and University of Pennsylvania announce research and licensing agreement that seeks to build on the promising results of an experimental treatment that trains a person's immune system to kill cancer cells.
lead_paragraph: The alliance seeks to build on the results of an experimental treatment that trains a person’s immune system to kill cancer cells.

headline.seo: Novartis and Penn Unite On Anticancer Approach
headline.main: Novartis and Penn Unite on New Anticancer Path
headline.print_headline: Novartis and Penn Unite On New Anticancer Path
